item.title: Budget DIY GPS/GNSS Base Station / Receiver and NTRIP Server Client with ESP32 and UM980
item.category: "DIY Electronics" , "GNSS Technology" , "ESP32 Projects" , "IoT Applications" , "Budget Hardware" , "DIY Tutorials" , "Wireless Connectivity" , "GPS Solutions" , "GNSS Receivers" , "Embedded Systems"
item.description: Effortlessly set up a budget DIY GPS/GNSS base station and NTRIP Server / NTRIP Client using ESP32 and the Unicorecomm UM980 for accurate positioning.
